name: I3M Social world
description:
Welcome to I3M Social World!

With I3M Social World Beta, you’ll discover:

  • New social environments are updated frequently!
  • Previews of upcoming I3M Worlds!
  • Unique bonus activities, collaborations, and promotions put right into the World!
  • Custom avatars!  Have one made today and utilize it throughout all I3M Worlds!

As a thank you for your early support and feedback, we are automatically giving you a one-week premium subscription which enables you to have unlimited sessions with up to 15 guests!

Thanks a ton!
